name: Memento Mori
description: Memento Mori,2018 Painted as digital on PS,2448*3264 px. Memento Mori is to remember that the world and people are mortal as a concept. Do you remember this and enjoy life or live in fear? In "Memento Mori", a series of works, the artist draws attention to the different pleasures and fears of life in each of his works. What is a pleasure for some turns into fears that remind others of death and the aftermath.
